body:
Prohibit spack from reaching out to ANYTHING over the internet.

### Rationale

At SNL we have a software approval process for certain machines, and I want to ensure that nothing I have not had approved is going to be installed.

### Description

I think I'd just like an option to spack that says "--no-web" and forces the use of a local mirror, and prevents any downloading from the web.


### Additional information


### General information

Spack version: 0.14.2

Also this seems related to https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/3321
title: Prohibit any internet usage
